description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". One of a series of magazine films depicting various aspects of West Germany. Looks at Citizens' Action Groups, the flying personnel of the German Lufthansa, the town of Glockstadt, modern German films, mineworkers on the Rhine and Ruhr, the 17th World Gliding Championship.
